alert.note: Alert for Benton; Carroll; Madison; Washington (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 13 at 9:19AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Benton, northwestern Madison, Carroll and northern Washington Counties through 945 AM CDT... At 918 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a cluster of strong thunderstorms from Eureka Springs to near Springdale, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations in or near the path include... Fayetteville... Springdale... Rogers... Berryville... Eureka Springs... Lowell... Green Forest... Tontitown... Bethel Heights... Garfield... Gateway... Beaver... Hindsville... Carrollton... Rudd... Forum... Hobbs State Park... Clifty... War Eagle... Urbanette... This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 65 and 81. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
